name: Fast Bus and Furious Racing
description:
Mad Stunt Crazy Car Racing Driving Simulator

Free to Download and Play on Google Play Store.

Are you ready for the most extreme real stunt game? Grand Race Auto Car Stunt City is one type of Simulation Game. Get set for loads of thrill and action!
Drive through treacherous hills and risky paths! The fantasy stunt city is full of challenges!

Be a Grand Theft. It is theft vs Police Car Racing games.
Be a Theft Auto Racer & drive your car with speed like buttle of gunner.
Extreme drive theft auto car. Make criminal activity with cars. It is Crime simulator game drive bus at wild speed.

Be aware of Police cars They can damage & Destroy your car. Feel the extreme driving speed like grand theft. So police can't catch you.
Drive car like criminal or terrorist car car. Make it Car Crime simulator.
In This arcade car stunts game you race between blazing fires and accelerate your way through terrifying loops and jumps.
Drive at your full speed and you will complete the mission. Drive with the skills of a pro stunt and rocky driver.
A crazy yet dangerous adventure is waiting for you.

Features:

- You will get the opportunity to have a choice of three different cars.
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- different Levels with various obstacles
- Overview about you stats
- 3 different controls and steer strength option
- Awesome sports cars
